name: Mission: Maze! (3D Platformer)
description:
Modifications:

1. New title! I called it "Mission: Maze!" in honor of my new level.

2. New soundtrack! I created a completely new and original soundtrack for the game using Ableton Live. I attached a screenshot of me editing the song which involves 7 different instrument/audio tracks! 

3. New level - maze! I created a completely new (and very large) level for the player to traverse. It is a large maze where the player must find the keycard and then the corresponding door while navigating the maze and fighting off enemies. 

4. New Player Death Effect! I added new particle effects to the player death using the techniques discussed in the tutorial and exploring more. The new effect is kind of like greyish purple smoke, and a burst of fading health ticks. I thought this looked cool as if the player was losing all of their health/health was spilling out. 

Credits:

Created by: Erin Sawyer
